short_description: This function samples a table and returns a fixed number of rows.
long_description: This function samples a table and returns a fixed number of rows.

argument_clauses.name: Domain
argument_clauses.description: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queenâ€™s IP saddress or hostname.

argument_clauses.name: Database
argument_clauses.description: The name of the database where the input table is located.

argument_clauses.name: UserId
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.

argument_clauses.name: Password
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database password of the user.

argument_clauses.name: SSLSettings
argument_clauses.description: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.

argument_clauses.name: SSLTrustStorePassword
argument_clauses.description: The password for the SSL truststore.

argument_clauses.name: InputTable
argument_clauses.description: The name of the input table to be sampled from.

argument_clauses.name: WeightColumn
argument_clauses.description: Specify the weight column to perform weighted sampling of the rows. Input columns must contain numeric SQL types.

argument_clauses.name: SamplingMode
argument_clauses.description: The type of sampling you wish to use. The permitted input values are [Basic, KMeans++, Kmeans||]. The default value is Basic.

argument_clauses.name: Distance
argument_clauses.description: The distance function to be used for KMeans++ sampling. The permitted input values are [Euclidean, Manhattan]. The default value is Euclidean.

argument_clauses.name: InputColumns
argument_clauses.description: Specify the columns to be used for KMeans++ sampling.

argument_clauses.name: CategoryWeights
argument_clauses.description: Category weights to be used with KMeans++ sampling.

argument_clauses.name: Seed
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the random seed used to initialize the algorithm.

argument_clauses.name: SeedColumn
argument_clauses.description: The SeedColumn is required to ensure repeatable sampling if the seed is specified. Input columns cannot contain doubles or floats.
